title: Crusade
description: Vampires—the Cursed Ones—have made their presence known to mankind…and declared war on humanity. Most people are too afraid or unwilling to take a stand, but eighteen-year-old Jenn Leitner trains to become a vampire fighter, risking everything in the process.When Jenn falls for Antonio, a vampire fighting on the side of humanity, she discovers a love that transcends attraction and physical consummation—but before the couple can reconcile their forbidden affair, they must bring light into the darkness that vampires have spread across the world.
author: Nancy Holder
